description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Go treasure hunting with Sid the Tomato!   Explore 16 huge  levels across 4 exotic environments in this retro-styled 2D platforming blast from the past!!   Use Sids flamethrower and cluster bombs to take out the crazed wildlife and open new paths with TNT!
description.short: Go treasure hunting with Sid the Tomato!   Explore 16 huge  levels across 4 exotic environments in this retro-styled 2D platforming blast from the past!!   Use Sids flamethrower and cluster bombs to take out the crazed wildlife and open new paths with TNT!
